name: part_011
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・昼公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】 [9eibYGNOz30]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Promotional loop for AZKi and Tokino Sora's music and upcoming live events, featuring song covers and album announcements.
Second iteration of the promotional loop, repeating the advertisements and song snippets.
Continued loop of promotional slides and music snippets for the pre-show waiting period.

subtitles.original:
ときのそら 2024年3月6日(水) Release
Mini Album STAR STAR★T リリース決定！
subtitles.english:
Tokino Sora: New Mini Album "STAR STAR★T"
Releasing March 6, 2024!

subtitles.original: ときのそら 歌ってみた「可愛くてごめん」配信中！
subtitles.english: Tokino Sora: "Kawaii kute Gomen" (Cover) Now Available!

subtitles.original: SorAZ メジャーデビューアルバム Futurity Step 配信中！
subtitles.english: SorAZ Major Debut Album "Futurity Step" Now Available!

subtitles.original: SorAZ Major Debut Live 「First Gravity」 CD物販限定特典
subtitles.english: SorAZ Major Debut Live "First Gravity" CD Merch Venue Exclusive Benefits

subtitles.original:
エルタマ 出し入れ企画 参加者様一覧

subtitles.english:
El-Tama Gift Box Project Participant List
To everyone who sent gifts, thank you very much!
